mapper.select: select m.m_code, m_name, p_star,p_code, p_photo, p_review, m_date, m_location, p.id, p_redcard, p_complete, b.grade, b.id, g.g_code from participation p, mission m, member b, grade g where m.m_code = p.m_code and p_complete = 1 and p.id = b.id and g.g_code = b.grade and m_name like CONCAT('%',#{m_name},'%') order by p_code desc;
